SummaryEnglish: The Umamusume are up to their usual hijinks—in teeny-tiny chibi form! Each 3-minute short in this miniseries is packed with silly fun, where you can't help but cheer ALL the racers on!

1.SummaryEnglish: Vodka and Daiwa Scarlet are going about their usual training when a storm suddenly arrives—almost as though to herald the meeting of two rivals...

2.SummaryEnglish: Special Week's quest to clear the cafeteria of all things edible is cut short by the unsettling leer of Symboli Kris S.

3.SummaryEnglish: Evening falls upon BAR Hosojun, where Umamusume like Tanino Gimlet go to wash away their fatigue with unique cocktail mixes.

4.SummaryEnglish: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi always wished she wasn't so weak—until someone shows her that there's more than one way to obtain strength.

5.SummaryEnglish: Vodka and Daiwa Scarlet fume over a magazine's totally inaccurate accusation of them being "besties," and take matters into their own hands.

6.SummaryEnglish: When a cryptic message appears at the onsen, Daiwa Scarlet realizes there's something going on under the surface—but Tokai Teio and her rival detectives are on the case!

7.SummaryEnglish: Vodka's enamoured by Sirius Symboli's style, but has she got what it takes to emulate the coolest Umamusume at Tracen?

8.SummaryEnglish: Twinkle Monthly reporter Etsuko Otonashi heads to the field to research ideas for her next "Star Spotlight" feature... but should she interview Vodka? Or Daiwa Scarlet?

9.SummaryEnglish: Four Umamusume careen down a mountain road. Engines on turbo, taking impossibly tight turns... Which racer can drift their way to victory?

10.SummaryEnglish: Seiun Sky livens up the summer camp with ghost stories, to the dismay of Special Week and King Halo. The candles going out was definitely just a coincidence, though... Right?

11.SummaryEnglish: Symboli Kris S confronts Tanino Gimlet in the hallway, while onlookers tremble in fear. What did Gimlet do this time?

12.SummaryEnglish: A-are those gang colors? At Tracen? ...The academy's three toughest teams square up for an all-out turf war!

13.TitleEnglish: Put Your Hands Up! Umayuru Rap
13.SummaryEnglish: Yo, yo! Check the hottest beats from the Umamusume underground! Tracen's hottest rappers duke it out, spitting rhymes like you've NEVER heard!

14.SummaryEnglish: Agnes Tachyon's cold smirk, met by the fiery glare of Air Shakur. Sometimes, it takes a mad scientist to unravel data's hidden logic...

15.SummaryEnglish: Tanino Gimlet artistically renders her philosophy of uncaged expression—but she's starting to run low on fences she can kick to splintery smithereens.

16.SummaryEnglish: Daiwa Scarlet groggily wakes to find herself trapped in an unsettlingly cheery glass box, a massive crane looming overhead.

17.SummaryEnglish: Fine Motion and Symboli Kris S visit a ninja trickhouse, but slowly catch on to a mysterious presence—and it's not part of the culture tour.

18.TitleEnglish: Test Track! The Race for Rudolf
18.SummaryEnglish: How much do YOU know about Symboli Rudolf? Contestants take on the Test Track, racing to prove their wits in a high-octane trivia battle!

19.SummaryEnglish: Someone's trapped Special Week and her friends. If they want to escape, each pair must cooperate to solve cryptic challenges.

20.SummaryEnglish: Mahjong masters assemble for another risky night around the table. Vodka's somehow got herself a seat—but will beginner's luck be enough to pull her through?

21.SummaryEnglish: Unfortunately for Air Shakur, Fine Motion's decided to pursue her dream of becoming a ramen UmaTuber—and there's no time like the present!

22.SummaryEnglish: Welcome to another episode of Pony Pantry, a cooking show featuring Special Week, Oguri Cap, and their assistant, Matikanetannhauser. This week, they'll be sharing their mouth-watering recipe for carrot hamburger steaks!

23.SummaryEnglish: Agnes Digital's stroll through the palace is met with one heart-pounding encounter after another! But... which of the three Symboli princes will our heroine choose?

24.SummaryEnglish: The Derby—a once-in-a-lifetime chance at glory. Symboli Kris S and Tanino Gimlet make the walk to the starting gates, reminiscing on the days they shared...

1.SummaryEnglish: Tamamo Cross swears that her takoyaki will be the best food stand at the Solefall Faire. She juuust so happens to be next to Gold Ship's yakisoba stand. But hey, what could possibly go wrong with Golshi around?

2.SummaryEnglish: When several people inexplicably vanish from the remote Yatsuhashi Village, Detective Seiun Sky and Officer King Halo rush to the scene. Will they be able to unravel the truth behind the mysterious "blight?"

3.SummaryEnglish: Biwa Hayahide gathers Hishi Miracle and fellow racers for a test run before the Spring Fan Fest. She's got some crazy plans, so it's bound to be a relay unlike any before!

4.SummaryEnglish: Curren Chan's planning a social media feature on the joys of spectating, so racing buff Chrono Genesis agrees to take her and friends on a #kawaii day at the track!
